message: Let's make a deal Bob. This offer is in your best interest, especially considering the inflation!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but it wasn't fair to me. Let's be reasonable, this split considers the impact of inflation on both our ends.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's a good deal for both of us considering how much the money will be worth soon. Let's be smart and close this.
Alice, this is the best I can do.  We are both losing money by dragging this out.  Let's be practical and end this.
